description: The Cavaliers lost six of seven and three straight games before beating the Toronto Raptors, 104-96, March 6 at Rocket Mortgage FieldHouse.

Report: Cavaliers center Jarrett Allen suffers fractured finger, out ...

It looks like the Cavs will have to navigate the rest of the regular season without Jarrett Allen, who suffered a fractured finger.
Cavs Top 3: Lauri Markkanen leads a crowded field to a victory
The Cleveland Cavaliers finally snapped their losing streak against the very game Toronto Raptors, thanks in part to Lauri Markkanen.
